conclusion: Analyze the path of the car and the arrangement of the blocks.
The car is moving from the lower left towards the upper right of the image.
The car will collide with the blocks that are in its path.
Since the car is moving towards the blocks, it will collide with the first block it reaches.
After colliding with the first block, the car will stop at the point where it initially started moving.
The car's power and deflection will determine how far it travels and where it stops.
The car will stop at the point where it first collides with a block, which is the starting point of its path.
The car will collide with the orange blocks and stop at the same point where it started moving.
